00030 using namespace std;
00031 using namespace affxchp;
00032 using namespace affxcdf;

00043 /*
00044  * Copy the file contents.
00045  */
00046 void CHPConversionUtilities::Copy(CHPData &inFile, CCHPFileWriter &outFile)
00047 {
00048         GeneChipProbeSetType probeSetType=UnknownProbeSetType;
00049         string assayType = inFile.GetAssayType();
00050         if(assayType == CHP_EXPRESSION_ASSAY_TYPE)
00051                 probeSetType = ExpressionProbeSetType;
00052 
00053         else if(assayType == CHP_GENOTYPING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00054                 probeSetType = GenotypingProbeSetType;
00055 
00056         else if(assayType == CHP_RESEQUENCING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00057                 probeSetType = ResequencingProbeSetType;
00058 
00059         else if(assayType == CHP_UNIVERSAL_ASSAY_TYPE)
00060                 probeSetType = TagProbeSetType;
00061 
00062         outFile.InitializeForWriting(
00063                 inFile.GetRows(), inFile.GetCols(), inFile.GetEntryCount(),
00064                 StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(inFile.GetArrayType()).c_str(), probeSetType);
00065         SetAlgName(outFile, StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(inFile.GetAlgName()));
00066         outFile.SetAlgorithmVersion(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(inFile.GetAlgVersion()).c_str());
00067         outFile.SetParentCelFileName(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(inFile.GetParentCell()).c_str());
00068         outFile.SetProgID(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(inFile.GetProgId()).c_str());
00069 
00070         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params = inFile.GetAlgParams();
00071         int n = (int) params.size();
00072         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00073         {
00074                 ParameterNameValueType &param = params[i];
00075                 outFile.AddAlgorithmParameter(
00076                         StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()).c_str(),
00077                         StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()).c_str());
00078         }
00079 
00080         params = inFile.GetChipSums();
00081         n = (int) params.size();
00082         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00083         {
00084                 ParameterNameValueType &param = params[i];
00085                 outFile.AddChipSummaryParameter(
00086                         StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()).c_str(),
00087                         StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()).c_str());
00088         }
00089 
00090         n = inFile.GetBackgroundZoneCnt();
00091         CHPBackgroundZone zone;
00092         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00093         {
00094                 inFile.GetBackgroundZone(i, zone);
00095                 if (i == 0)
00096                 {
00097                         outFile.AddBackgroundInfo(n, zone.GetSmoothFactor());
00098                 }
00099                 outFile.AddBackgroundZone((int)zone.GetCenterX(), (int)zone.GetCenterY(), zone.GetBackground());
00100         }
00101 
00102         if (probeSetType == ExpressionProbeSetType)
00103         {
00104                 CHPExpressionEntry entry;
00105                 CExpressionProbeSetResults results;
00106                 int n = inFile.GetEntryCount();
00107                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00108                 {
00109                         inFile.GetEntry(i, entry);
00110                         results.Signal = entry.GetSignal();
00111                         results.Detection = entry.GetDetection();
00112                         results.DetectionPValue = entry.GetDetectionPValue();
00113                         results.NumPairs = entry.GetNumPairs();
00114                         results.NumUsedPairs = entry.GetNumPairsUsed();
00115 
00116                         results.m_HasCompResults = entry.GetHasComparisonData();
00117                         results.Change = entry.GetChange();
00118                         results.ChangePValue = entry.GetChangePValue();
00119                         results.SignalLogRatio = entry.GetSigLogRatio();
00120                         results.SignalLogRatioLow = entry.GetSigLogRatioLo();
00121                         results.SignalLogRatioHigh = entry.GetSigLogRatioHi();
00122                         results.NumCommonPairs = entry.GetCommonPairs();
00123 
00124                         outFile.SetExpressionEntry(i, &results);
00125                 }
00126         }
00127         else if (probeSetType == GenotypingProbeSetType)
00128         {
00129                 CHPGenotypeEntry entry;
00130                 CGenotypeProbeSetResults results;
00131                 int n = inFile.GetEntryCount();
00132                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00133                 {
00134                         inFile.GetEntry(i, entry);
00135 
00136                         results.AlleleCall = entry.GetCall();
00137                         results.Confidence = entry.GetConfidence();
00138                         results.pvalue_AA = entry.GetAACall();
00139                         results.pvalue_AB = entry.GetABCall();
00140                         results.pvalue_BB = entry.GetBBCall();
00141                         results.pvalue_NoCall = entry.GetNoCall();
00142                         results.RAS1 = entry.GetRAS1();
00143                         results.RAS2 = entry.GetRAS2();
00144 
00145                         outFile.SetMappingEntry(i, &results);
00146                 }
00147         }
00148         else if (probeSetType == ResequencingProbeSetType)
00149         {
00150                 ForceCallType outF;
00151                 CHPReseqForceCall inF;
00152                 BaseCallType outO;
00153                 CHPReseqOrigCall inO;
00154                 CHPReseqEntry entry;
00155                 CResequencingResults results;
00156                 int n = inFile.GetEntryCount();
00157                 results.ResizeCalledBases(n);
00158                 results.ResizeScores(n);
00159                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00160                 {
00161                         inFile.GetEntry(i, entry);
00162                         results.SetCalledBase(i, entry.call);
00163                         results.SetScore(i, entry.score);
00164                 }
00165 
00166                 n = inFile.GetForceCnt();
00167                 results.ResizeForceCalls(n);
00168                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00169                 {
00170                         inFile.GetForceCall(i, inF);
00171                         outF.position = inF.position;
00172                         outF.call = inF.call;
00173                         outF.reason = inF.reason;
00174                         results.SetForceCall(i, outF);
00175                 }
00176 
00177                 n = inFile.GetOrigCnt();
00178                 results.ResizeOrigCalls(n);
00179                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00180                 {
00181                         inFile.GetOrigCall(i, inO);
00182                         outO.position = inO.position;
00183                         outO.call = inO.call;
00184                         results.SetOrigCall(i, outO);
00185                 }
00186 
00187                 outFile.SetResequencingResults(&results);
00188 
00189         }
00190         else if (probeSetType == TagProbeSetType)
00191         {
00192                 CHPUniversalEntry entry;
00193                 CUniversalProbeSetResults results;
00194                 int n = inFile.GetEntryCount();
00195                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00196                 {
00197                         inFile.GetEntry(i, entry);
00198                         results.SetBackground(entry.GetBackground());
00199                         outFile.SetUniversalEntry(i, &results);
00200                 }
00201         }
00202 }
00203 
00204 void CHPConversionUtilities::SetAlgName(affxchpwriter::CCHPFileWriter& outFile, std::string algName)
00205 {
00206         if (outFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Expression ||
00207                         outFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping)
00208         {
00209                 // Change the AssayType before setting the algorithm name to side-step
00210                 // CCHPFileWriter::SetAlgorithmName desire to prefix the algorithm name with
00211                 // either "Expression" or "Genotyping" depending on the AssayType.
00212                 CCHPFileHeader::GeneChipAssayType originalAssayType = outFile.GetHeader().GetAssayType();
00213                 outFile.GetHeader().SetAssayType(CCHPFileHeader::Universal);
00214                 outFile.SetAlgorithmName(algName.c_str());
00215                 outFile.GetHeader().SetAssayType(originalAssayType);
00216         }
00217 
00218         else
00219         {
00220                 outFile.SetAlgorithmName(algName.c_str());
00221         }
00222 }
